duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver education and training programs for nurses in the ambulatory care setting, with a focus on endoscopy and gastrointestinal procedures.
Facilitate professional development and learning opportunities for nursing staff, supporting their growth and expertise in the field.
Utilize educator experience to design and implement effective educational strategies and programs to meet the needs of nursing professionals.

education_certification.credential: Master’s degree in Nursing, Education, or related field (MSN preferred, BSN required)
